title: Cody the Catfish Hunter
description: Cody has been fishing since he was old enough to hold a fishing pole. Deciding to start his own club, he invites his two best friends to join. During their first day out Cody wonders if teaching his friends how to fish was a good idea.  Come and join the hilarious fun as Cody ‘The Catfish Hunter’ and his friends spend the day at the lake fishing for Big Bertha. (Ages 7-10)
author: Teresa Gabelman
